price: Yabashoboje no kwikora ku zuba no ku kwezi bitigera bihagarara n’akanya na gato, kugira mworoherwe kuba kw’isi, Iranabaremera ijoro n’umurango kugira muturure, muruhuke mw’ijoro muheze murondere icorirenza ku murango.
arabic: وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلشَّمۡسَ وَٱلۡقَمَرَ دَآئِبَيۡنِۖ وَسَخَّرَ لَكُمُ ٱلَّيۡلَ وَٱلنَّهَارَ

meta.transliteration: wasakhara lakumu al-shamsa wal-qamara dāibayni wasakhara lakumu al-layla wal-nahāra
